products.title: Urban Metallic Limestone Curtain
products.metadescription: Urban Metallic Limestone Curtain in Grey. Made to measure from £21.56 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Curtain includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Urban comes in several modern grey and cream shades, this hopsack range adds modern simplicity to your kitchen or bedroom.  Urban tales on a metallic appearance the light hits the fabric, adding more depth to this textured fabric. 
 
A medium grey shade, Urban Limestone allows the addition of a soft grey-toned fabric without being too dark or over-bearing.  Perfect for retaining a light and airy theme whilst adding some colour.
 
 Product ID: DB-CUR1099 Fabric Colour: Metallic Limestone Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Light Filtering Poly/Cotton Blended Lining     Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Increase to ER3 (High) By Adding Thermal Lining Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Velvet Leaf Green Curtain
products.metadescription: Velvet Leaf Green Curtain in Green. Made to measure from £24.42 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Curtain includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our soft-touch range of velvet fabrics add a touch of luxury and softness to your home. A multi-tonal fabric, our smooth velvet fabrics create depth when catching the light, and can create different looks depending on the time of day. From cosy winter mornings, to breezy summers, velvet fabrics have been a firm staple in home and fashion since the 1920s and 70s.
 This soft curtain in Leaf Green, breathes life into hue to your home.  A saturated, medium green hue, this velvet green curtain creates a decadent look for a fraction of the price on the high street. 
 At Swift Direct Blinds, not only is this curtain made by the experts at our Yorkshire factory, but with over 50 years experience, our curtains are made to last. Our curtains come with five year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, and customer-first service! 
  
 Product ID: DB-CUR1250 Fabric Colour: Leaf Green Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Light Filtering Poly/Cotton Blended Lining     Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Increase to ER3 (High) By Adding Thermal Lining Light Filtering: Yes

At Swift Direct Blinds, quality is important to us, which is why this curtain comes with our FREE five-year guarantee and customer-first service. Available as a matching roman!
